entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InterpolatedStringHandler methods on struct types are called on the wrong method target #81322
  • [wasm] `MonoProxy` behaves incorrectly when value for the `column` property is missing in `Debugger.setBreakpointByUrl` call #81321
  • Use PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder for System.Net.Http.HttpConnection async reads #81318
  • Apply "printf format" to APIs #81316
    Future
  • Is Use of the Microsoftl.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces Library Actually Supported? #81313
  • [workloads] Add downlevel version check for workload versions #81310
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Build `dotnet/runtime` and `dotnet/runtime` dependencies using `dotnet/emsdk` packages #81309
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_72845/Runtime_72845/Runtime_72845.sh #81314
  • BufferBlock.OutputAvailableAsync does not set CancellationToken when canceled #24307
    8.0.0
  • WasmBuildTests are failing in CI #81302
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #44227
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Misc fixes #81320
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup in HelloiOS app in non-LLVM debug configuration #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Optimize some bound checks around "(uint)x < cns" pattern #81317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81308
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.x
  • Remove types deriving from JsonTypeInfo<T> and mark as sealed. #81306
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [wasm] Update emsdk dependency to `8.0.0-alpha.1.23077.4` #81312
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow
  • Remove `printf` implementation #81243
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [wasm][mt] Don't call Module.removeRunDependency in workers #81311
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid passing the icall name/c function name to mono_reg… #81293
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Clean up StackTrace/StackFrame icalls. #81303
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Use mono_is_sre functions instead of checking class names in m… #81305
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix the error condition for objcopy #81304
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Improve handling of the ldtoken+ltoken+Type::op_Equal opt… #81277
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • JIT: build pred lists before instrumentation #81288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Sprinkle some more readonly around #81297
    area-Meta
  • Disable function pointer test for crossgen due to an existing issue #81286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add reflection path for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #81262
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.4
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a comment attached to DEFAULT_UNROLL_LOOP_MAX_ITERATION_COUNT #81300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28

Created

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Performance: faster switch over string objects #56374
    17.6
  • Bug: Using byref fields, it's possible to mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66128
    17.6
  • TextDocument.Folders is always empty for additional files #65589
    17.6

Updated

  • Enums & generic math #66542
  • "An item with the same key has already been added" in .Net Analyzer (InlineSuppressionsDiagnosticAnalyzer) #50496
  • VS caches Source Generator aggressively - hinders iterative development #48083
    Compiler.Next
  • Nullable semantic model is wrong for field initializers #46424
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/CollectionLiterals #66587
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge 'main' into 'features\CollectionLiterals' #66586
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid generating arbitrarily long pattern examples #66585
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Introduce parser helper for parsing separated syntax lists. #66552
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Revert "Prefer list-pattern for length-only counterexamples (#66541)" #66576
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66581
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid unnecessary parsing in brace-completion #66575
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move compiler from netcoreapp3.1 to net6.0 #66565
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report when MethodImplOptions.Synchronized is used on async lambda #66568
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable static restore in more locations #66567
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot build ASP.NET Core 7 app for Raspberry Pi 4 #46306
  • When session and cookie timeout call to Azure B2C authorize endpoint fails with CORS error. #46305
  • source-building .NET 7 fails when building npmprojects #46304

Closed

  • Web Finger (RFC7033) middleware #45143
    Discussions
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity
  • Changing reflection-base json configuration to PostConfigure #46303

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui App crashes on an android device when navigating to another page #12980
  • `CodeBehindGenerator` has improper pipeline #12978
  • RefreshView activity animation doesn't respect canExecute within the Command #12977
  • Toast throws exception on Windows #12976
  • .Net MAUI 7 Android, Image Gif Animation Not Playing in Release Mode, Normal in Debug Mode #12974
  • .NET MAUI app's UI Automation hierarchy has a root window element with no accessible name #12973
  • [Regression] [Android] ImageButton with Clip and bound IsVisible property does not display #12972

Closed

  • "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.ShellFlyoutItemView" is reported to screen readers instead of the shown text - poor accessibility #12919
  • Explicit style definition influences the behavior of implicit style definition #12979
  • [Windows/Android] Preview 14 Editor does not resize automatically #5363
    Backlog
  • WinUI Dynamic height in grid does not work when nothing else changes #10799
    Backlog
  • ScrollView layout not updating after dynamic change. #9078
  • VerticalStackLayout does not trigger parent Grid resize properly when children are added #11453
    Backlog
  • Label cut-off inside Grid with multiple *-columns #7363
    Backlog
  • Grid: [Windows] Auto Row definition does not fully visualise its elements #12103
    Backlog
  • Fix Grid Auto height based on Images #7388
    Backlog
  • Live Visual Tree is missing "Defined in..." arrow for objects #10434
    Backlog
  • Slow MacCatalyst builds #5447
    Backlog
  • [mauipalooza] Android emulator is not added immediately when MAUI project is added to existing solution #5921
    Backlog
  • Build for Android outputs Windows error #5954
    Backlog
  • VS2022Preview NetMaui - Problem with the application icon in IOS #6572
  • Space in path causes ClassParse to fail #8049
  • When editing a MAUI csproj, VS auto inserts `AndroidResource` of the item that was changed #8078
    Backlog
  • App cant run on iOS, but normal on mac and android simulator. #8132
  • App does not deployed to local as well as remote iPhone #8444
  • Tool /usr/bin/codesign execution finished (exit code = 1). #8497
  • [VisualDiagnostics] RectangleAdorner is broken #8727
  • The target "PrepareMsixPackage" does not exist in the project #9432
  • Appsettings build error #10908
    Backlog
  • The default MAUI application created by Visual Studio on the Apple M1 platform cannot launch the Android emulator #11312
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12971
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #12912
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Complex query generated for Include(Where).SingleOrDefault #30170
  • Missing closing ) for decimal type when generating migration. Core 7.0.2 #30169
  • OnConfiguring no longer has condition to check !optionsBuilder.IsConfigured #30168
  • Include & cache entity types to model on-demand basis #30166
  • Eager loading two objects with reference to same related object (N:1) with same context #30165

Closed

  • Query JSON array column size throws exception #30132
  • How to store a conditional/calculated property in ef core 6 #30127
  • Error when setting column attributes #30118
  • how to override like or contain operator in sqlite ? #30063
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.InternalUsageDiagnosticAnalyzer #29984
  • Support insertion of keyless entities #24767
  • Support for abstract types in JSON #30043

PullRequests

Created

  • issue #29710 #30167
  • Remove unchecks in SQL Server type mappings #30164

Updated

  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [workloads] Prerelease sdkband workload versioning should key off the nuget package version by default #15367

PullRequests

Updated

  • Move NetCore.App package to the last step to avoid clobbering #15272
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2099124 #15354
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15279
